
Revision 0.0.3, released 2018-08-06
-----------------------------------

- Fixed conditional dependencies workings in conjunction with
  wheels

Revision 0.0.2, released 2018-07-07
-----------------------------------

- Added unit tests and Travis CI hook
- Bumped upper Python version to 3.7

Revision 0.0.1, released 2018-02-19
-----------------------------------

- Initial revision - split crypto parts that are dependent on external
  crypto libraries off pysnmp
